BrowserMetrics

This class is deprecated and should eventually be removed.  This class is used by the animation sequence class to control the positioning of items on the rendered page.

Summary
BrowserMetrics
This class is deprecated and should eventually be removed.  This class is used by the animation sequence class to control the positioning of items on the rendered page.
Functions
BrowserMetrics
Initializes the Object
fullScreen
Display an item fullscreen.
windowDimensions
Returns: an array containing the width and height of the brower’s viewport
scrollOffset
Returns: an array containing the width and height of the brower’s offset

Functions

Initializes the Object

Display an item fullscreen.

Parameters

itemString of a DOM element.

Returns: an array containing the width and height of the brower’s viewport

scrollOffset

scrollOffset: function()

Returns: an array containing the width and height of the brower’s offset
